claim.text: ChatCite performs best among LLM-based literature summarization methods, and the approach following the human workflow guidance is superior to the results obtained by the Chain of Thought (CoT) method.
claim.exact_quote: Therefore, we conclude that "ChatCite performs best among LLM-based literature summarization methods, and the approach following the human workflow guidance is superior to the results obtained by the Chain of Thought (CoT) method."

evidence.evidence_text: ChatCite performs better in all dimensions of ROUGE metrics and the metrics generated by the LLM based evaluator.
Human evaluation experiments show that ChatCite outperforms other methods in terms of consistency, coherency, comparative analysis, integrity, fluency, and citation accuracy.
evidence.limitations: evaluation was conducted by a small number of researchers

claim.text: The Key Element Extractor module plays an effective role in literature summarization.
claim.exact_quote: Therefore, it indicates that the Topic Extractor module plays an effective role in literature summarization.

evidence.evidence_text: ChatCite with Key Element Extractor outperforms ChatCite without Key Element Extractor in all dimensions of ROUGE metrics and the metrics generated by the LLM-based evaluator.

claim.text: The Comparative Incremental Mechanism significantly contributes to the effectiveness of literature summarization in the ChatCite framework.
claim.exact_quote: This suggests that the Comparative Incremental Mechanism significantly contributes to the effectiveness of literature summarization in the ChatCite framework.

evidence.evidence_text: ChatCite with Comparative Incremental Mechanism outperforms ChatCite without Comparative Incremental Mechanism in all dimensions of ROUGE metrics and the metrics generated by the LLM-based evaluator.

claim.text: The Reflective Mechanism effectively improves the quality and stability of the text generated in ChatCite.
claim.exact_quote: This affirms that the Reflective Mechanism effectively improves the quality and stability of the text generated in ChatCite.

evidence.evidence_text: Boxplot results show that ChatCite with Reflective Mechanism is more stable across all dimensions.
Human evaluation experiments show that ChatCite with Reflective Mechanism generates more consistent, coherent, and accurate text.
evidence.limitations: evaluation was conducted by a small number of researchers

evaluation.key_limitations: evaluation was conducted by a small number of researchers

claim.text: Each part of ChatCite framework contributes to the improvement of the quality and stability of the generated results in literature summaries.
claim.exact_quote: Overall, through ablation experiments on three components, we have demonstrated that "each part of ChatCite framework contributes to the improvement of the quality and stability of the generated results in literature summaries".

evidence.evidence_text: Ablation experiments show that each part of ChatCite framework contributes to the improvement of at least one dimension of ROUGE metrics or the metrics generated by the LLM-based evaluator.
